columns.name: The name of the person, serving as a unique identifier within the table.
columns.age: The age of the person, indicating how many years they have lived.
columns.city: The city where the person resides, providing information about their location.
columns.gender: The gender of the person, capturing the individual's self-identified gender identity.
columns.job: The occupation or role of the person, reflecting their professional engagement.

Person.table_description: The Person table contains demographic and professional information about individuals, identified uniquely by their name.

columns.name: The name of the person who has a friendship connection.
columns.friend: The name of the person who is identified as a friend of the individual in the 'name' column.
columns.year: The duration of the friendship in years.

PersonFriend.table_description: The PersonFriend table captures the friendship relationships between individuals, detailing who is friends with whom and the length of their friendship.
